SHIPMENT.ASSIGN_LOTS_TOOLTIP: Assign the selected lots to this container
SHIPMENT.DOES_SHIPMENT_EXIST: Do you have a shipment ready?
SHIPMENT.DOES_SHIPMENT_EXIST_HELP: Please provide the reference of a shipment that is ready to ship.
SHIPMENT.ENTER_SHIPMENT_PROGRESS: Please enter the shipment progress status.  Include the current shipment location if it has changed.
SHIPMENT.ENTER_SHIPMENT_PROGRESS_HELP_TEXT: Ex. RECEPTION - IMA GOMA WAREHOUSE, GOMA
SHIPMENT.EXISTING_ASSETS_IN_OTHER_SHIPMENT: You have the following assets in ongoing shipments. Please send or cancel these shipments so that you can reassign those assets
SHIPMENT.IS_IN_TRANSIT_TOOLTIP: This inventory is in transit to the depot ({{depot}})
SHIPMENT.MARK_DELIVERED_MESSAGE: You confirm that the shipment has arrived at the destination depot
SHIPMENT.MARK_COMPLETE_MESSAGE: You confirm that this shipment is complete
SHIPMENT.MARK_COMPLETE_MESSAGE2: (even though some items were partially delivered).
SHIPMENT.MARKED_READY_TO_SHIP: Shipment marked as ready to ship
SHIPMENT.MARK_READY_TO_SHIP_MESSAGE: You confirm that this shipment is ready to leave the depot.
SHIPMENT.MARK_READY_TO_SHIP_MESSAGE2: (You will no longer be able to make changes to it.)
SHIPMENT.PLEASE_SHIP_EXISTING_SHIPMENT: Please ship or cancel these existing shipments
SHIPMENT.STOCK_ENTRY_PARTIAL: Partial stock entry for shipment performed
SHIPMENT.STOCK_EXITED_DONE: Stock exit performed for the shipment
SHIPMENT.TITLE: Shipment
SHIPMENT.UPDATE_LOCATION_MESSAGE: You are about to change the location of this shipment, this information will be saved in the history of this shipment
SHIPMENT.UPDATE_LOCATION_WARNING: You cannot change the location because only shipments with an IN-TRANSIT status can allow the change of location
